name: Just Another Cog (Unfinished)
description:
A game produced for OLC CodeJam 2020, the great machine.

Unfortunatelty due to personal time constraints I wasn't able to create a full fledged game so it is heavily unfinished, it is essentially a walking simulator demo lol.

WASD or arrow keys to move,

Mouse lets you aim a gun, but you can't shoot it.

F5 creates a new level.

F2 toggles on and off the shadow casting (as it is quite cpu intesive)

All assets were created by me, feel free to use them if you'd like.

View the sourcecode on github
